dmca.title: [EV1-C1552930M] Fw: Infringement of Copyright - Piano on the Net
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net]

Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: [EV1-C1552930M] Fw: Infringement of Copyright - Piano on the Net
Subject: [EV1-C1552930M] Fw: Infringement of Copyright - Piano on the Net

> Swami Rajesh Chopra,
> 
> Since you have ignored my requests over the past few years to remove

> hosting provider (Everyones Internet). Their "Acceptable Use Policy"

> 
> "16. Infringement of Copyright, Patent, Trademark, Trade Secret, or 
> Intellectual Property Right: Use of the EV1
